roleset.name: portray as a demon

example.name: th' vasty plains of hell
example.text: What shook America was not a battle for justice but for naked power, in which an army of judicial activists rolled over a judge [0] they had demonized [*T*].

roleset.note: DEMONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'demonize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from demonize.01-v predicate notes)
